member.name: P:Castle.Components.Common.TemplateEngine.NVelocityTemplateEngine.NVelocityTemplateEngine.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the assembly name. This forces NVelocityTemplateEngine to use an assembly resource loader instead of File resource loader (which is the default)
member.remarks: The property is obsolete, please use the AddResourceAssembly function.
